mapper.select:
SELECT PL.PP_CD "PP_CD", TO_CHAR(PL.PP_DT,'YYYY-MM-DD') "PP_DT", PL.PP_NM "PP_NM",
CASE WHEN (SELECT SUM(DTL.PD_QTY) FROM PLAN_DTL DTL WHERE DTL.PP_CD = PL.PP_CD ) -
SUM(( SELECT SUM(PC.PROD_QTY) FROM PROD_CURQTY PC, PROD_LOT PLOT WHERE PC.PROD_LOT = PLOT.PROD_LOT AND PLOT.PROD_CD = DT.PROD_CD )) > 0 THEN (SELECT SUM(DTL.PD_QTY) FROM PLAN_DTL DTL WHERE DTL.PP_CD = PL.PP_CD ) ELSE NULL END AS "PD_QTY"
FROM PRDT_PL PL, PLAN_DTL DT WHERE PL.PP_CD = DT.PP_CD GROUP BY PL.PP_CD, PL.PP_DT, PL.PP_NM

SELECT PL.PP_CD "생산계획코드", TO_CHAR(PL.PP_DT,'YYYY-MM-DD') "계획일자", M.MT_NM "원자재명", M.MT_CD "원자재코드",
CASE WHEN
SUM(PDTL.PD_QTY- (SELECT SUM(PCQTY.PROD_QTY) FROM PROD_CURQTY PCQTY, PROD_LOT PLOT WHERE PCQTY.PROD_LOT = PLOT.PROD_LOT AND PLOT.PROD_CD = PDTL.PROD_CD )) * B.CS_QTY -
(SELECT SUM(MCQTY.MT_QTY) FROM MT_CURQTY MCQTY, MT_LOT MLOT WHERE MCQTY.MT_LOT = MLOT.MT_LOT AND MLOT.MT_CD = M.MT_CD) < 0 THEN NULL ELSE '부족' END AS "구분"
FROM PRDT_PL PL, PLAN_DTL PDTL, BOM B, MT M WHERE PL.PP_CD = PDTL.PP_CD AND PDTL.PROD_CD = B.PROD_CD AND B.MT_CD = M.MT_CD AND PL.PP_CD = #{ppCd} GROUP BY PL.PP_CD, TO_CHAR(PL.PP_DT,'YYYY-MM-DD'), B.CS_QTY, M.MT_NM, M.MT_CD order by 4

SELECT M.MT_NM "원자재명", M.MT_CD "원자재코드", TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYY-MM-DD') "납기요청일자", V.VDR_NM "업체명",
SUM(PDTL.PD_QTY- (SELECT SUM(PCQTY.PROD_QTY) FROM PROD_CURQTY PCQTY, PROD_LOT PLOT WHERE PCQTY.PROD_LOT = PLOT.PROD_LOT AND PLOT.PROD_CD = PDTL.PROD_CD )) * B.CS_QTY "계획대비 필요수량",
(SELECT SUM(MCQTY.MT_QTY) FROM MT_CURQTY MCQTY, MT_LOT MLOT WHERE MCQTY.MT_LOT = MLOT.MT_LOT AND MLOT.MT_CD = M.MT_CD) AS "현재고",
SUM(PDTL.PD_QTY- (SELECT SUM(PCQTY.PROD_QTY) FROM PROD_CURQTY PCQTY, PROD_LOT PLOT WHERE PCQTY.PROD_LOT = PLOT.PROD_LOT AND PLOT.PROD_CD = PDTL.PROD_CD )) * B.CS_QTY - (SELECT SUM(MCQTY.MT_QTY) FROM MT_CURQTY MCQTY, MT_LOT MLOT WHERE MCQTY.MT_LOT = MLOT.MT_LOT AND MLOT.MT_CD = M.MT_CD) "발주량"
FROM PRDT_PL PL, PLAN_DTL PDTL, BOM B, MT M, VENDOR V WHERE PL.PP_CD = PDTL.PP_CD AND PDTL.PROD_CD = B.PROD_CD AND B.MT_CD = M.MT_CD AND V.VDR_CD = M.VDR_CD AND PDTL.PP_CD = #{ppCd} AND M.MT_CD = #{mtCd} GROUP BY PL.PP_CD, TO_CHAR(PL.PP_DT,'YYYY-MM-DD'), B.CS_QTY, M.MT_NM, SYSDATE, M.MT_CD, V.VDR_NM order by 4

SELECT DISTINCT po.po_cd "원자재발주코드", m.mt_cd "원자재코드", m.mt_nm "원자재명", vdr.vdr_nm "업체명", pdl.po_qty "발주수량", m.mt_unit "단위", to_char(po.po_reqdt, 'YYyy-MM-DD') "발주신청일", to_char(pdl.po_reqdt, 'YYyy-MM-DD') "납기신청일", m.mt_prc "단가", (po_qty*mt_prc)"금액"
FROM mt_po po, mt m, vendor vdr, mt_podtl pdl
WHERE po.po_cd = pdl.po_cd AND pdl.mt_cd = m.mt_cd AND m.vdr_cd = vdr.vdr_cd AND po.po_cd IN (select po_cd from mt_podtl where po_cd not IN (select po_cd from mt_chk))

SELECT po.po_cd "원자재발주코드", m.mt_cd "원자재코드", m.mt_nm "원자재명", vdr.vdr_nm "업체명", pdl.po_qty "발주수량", m.mt_unit "단위", to_char(lot.mt_wdt, 'YYYY-MM-DD') "입고신청일", to_char(pdl.po_reqdt, 'YYYY-MM-DD') "납기신청일", m.mt_prc "단가", (po_qty*mt_prc)"금액"
FROM mt_po po, mt m, vendor vdr, mt_podtl pdl, mt_lot lot WHERE po.po_cd = pdl.po_cd AND po.mt_cd = m.mt_cd AND m.mt_cd = lot.mt_cd AND m.vdr_cd = vdr.vdr_cd
AND po.po_cd LIKE '%'||#{poCdinput}||'%'

SELECT MTD.PO_CD "원자재발주코드", MTD.MT_CD "원자재코드", M.MT_NM "원자재명", V.VDR_NM "업체명", BIM.B_IN_QTY "입고량", TO_CHAR(lot.mt_wdt, 'YYYY-MM-DD') "입고일시", lot.mt_lot "원자재LOT번호", TO_CHAR(SYSDATE+31 ,'YYYY-MM-DD') "유통기한"
FROM MT_CHK_DTL MTD, MT M, VENDOR V, BEFOR_IN_MT BIM, MT_LOT lot
WHERE MTD.MT_CD = M.MT_CD AND M.VDR_CD = V.VDR_CD AND MTD.CHK_CD = BIM.CHK_CD AND lot.mt_cd = m.mt_cd AND MTD.CHK_DTL_INSP = 'MTRL02'
AND m.mt_nm LIKE '%'||#{m1}||'%'
AND v.vdr_nm LIKE '%'||#{m2}||'%'
AND lot.mt_wdt between TO_DATE(#{req1},'YYYY-MM-DD') AND TO_DATE(#{req2},'YYYY-MM-DD')

SELECT MTD.PO_CD "원자재발주코드", MTD.MT_CD "원자재코드", M.MT_NM "원자재명", V.VDR_NM "업체명", BIM.B_IN_QTY "입고예정량", TO_CHAR(MTD.CHK_DT ,'YYYY-MM-DD') "검사일자"
FROM MT_CHK_DTL MTD, MT M, VENDOR V, BEFOR_IN_MT BIM, MT_PO MP
WHERE MTD.MT_CD = M.MT_CD AND M.VDR_CD = V.VDR_CD AND MTD.CHK_CD = BIM.CHK_CD AND MTD.CHK_DTL_INSP = 'MTRL02' AND mtd.po_cd = mp.po_cd AND mp.po_par NOT LIKE '입고완료'

SELECT po.po_cd "원자재발주코드", m.mt_cd "원자재코드", m.mt_nm "원자재명", v.vdr_nm "업체명", c.mt_qty "입고량", TO_CHAR(lot.mt_wdt, 'YYYY-MM-DD') "입고일시", lot.mt_lot "원자재LOT번호", TO_CHAR(lot.mt_exp, 'YYYY-MM-DD') "유통기한"
FROM mt_po po, mt_podtl pdl, mt m, vendor v, mt_curqty c, mt_lot lot
WHERE po.po_cd = pdl.po_cd AND m.mt_cd = pdl.mt_cd AND m.vdr_cd = v.vdr_cd AND lot.mt_cd = m.mt_cd AND lot.mt_lot = c.mt_lot

SELECT po.po_cd "원자재발주코드", m.mt_cd "원자재코드", m.mt_nm "원자재명", v.vdr_nm "업체명", c.mt_qty "입고량", lot.mt_wdt "입고일시", lot.mt_lot "원자재LOT번호", lot.mt_exp "유통기한"
FROM mt_po po, mt_podtl pdl, mt m, vendor v, mt_curqty c, mt_lot lot
WHERE po.po_cd = pdl.po_cd AND m.mt_cd = pdl.mt_cd AND m.vdr_cd = v.vdr_cd AND lot.mt_cd = m.mt_cd AND lot.mt_lot = c.mt_lot
AND m.mt_nm LIKE '%'||#{m1}||'%'
AND v.vdr_nm LIKE '%'||#{m2}||'%'
AND lot.mt_wdt between TO_DATE(#{req1},'YYYY-MM-DD') AND TO_DATE(#{req2},'YYYY-MM-DD')

SELECT lot.mt_lot "mt_lot", lot.mt_cd "mt_cd", m.mt_nm "mt_nm", vd.vdr_nm "vdr_nm", cy.mt_qty "mt_qty", TO_CHAR(lot.mt_exp,'YYYY-MM-DD') "mt_exp" FROM mt_lot lot, mt m, vendor vd, mt_curqty cy WHERE m.mt_cd = lot.mt_cd AND m.vdr_cd = vd.vdr_cd AND lot.mt_lot = cy.mt_lot

SELECT lot.mt_lot "mt_lot", lot.mt_cd "mt_cd", m.mt_nm "mt_nm", vd.vdr_nm "vdr_nm", cy.mt_qty "mt_qty", TO_CHAR(lot.mt_exp,'YYYY-MM-DD') "mt_exp" FROM mt_lot lot, mt m, vendor vd, mt_curqty cy WHERE m.mt_cd = lot.mt_cd AND m.vdr_cd = vd.vdr_cd AND lot.mt_lot = cy.mt_lot
AND m.mt_nm LIKE '%'||#{m1}||'%'
AND vd.vdr_nm LIKE '%'||#{m2}||'%'
AND lot.mt_wdt between TO_DATE(#{req1},'YYYY-MM-DD') AND TO_DATE(#{req2},'YYYY-MM-DD')

SELECT LOT.MT_CD "원자재코드", M.MT_NM "원자재명", V.VDR_CD "업체명", SUM(C.MT_QTY) "수량", M.MT_SFQTY "안전재고"
FROM MT_LOT LOT, MT M, VENDOR V, MT_CURQTY C
WHERE M.MT_CD = LOT.MT_CD AND M.VDR_CD = V.VDR_CD AND LOT.MT_LOT = C.MT_LOT GROUP BY LOT.MT_CD, M.MT_NM, V.VDR_CD, M.MT_SFQTY

SELECT LOT.MT_CD "원자재코드", M.MT_NM "원자재명", V.VDR_CD "업체명", SUM(C.MT_QTY) "수량", M.MT_SFQTY "안전재고"
FROM MT_LOT LOT, MT M, VENDOR V, MT_CURQTY C
WHERE M.MT_CD = LOT.MT_CD AND M.VDR_CD = V.VDR_CD AND LOT.MT_LOT = C.MT_LOT
AND m.mt_nm LIKE '%'||#{m1}||'%'
AND v.vdr_nm LIKE '%'||#{m2}||'%'
GROUP BY LOT.MT_CD, M.MT_NM, V.VDR_CD, M.MT_SFQTY

SELECT m.mt_cd "원자재코드", m.mt_nm "원자재명", m.mt_unit "단위", NVL( SUM(c.mt_qty), 0) "현재고", m.mt_sfqty "안전재고" FROM mt m, mt_lot lot, mt_curqty c WHERE m.mt_cd = lot.mt_cd AND lot.mt_lot = c.mt_loT GROUP BY m.mt_cd, m.mt_nm, m.mt_sfqty, m.mt_unit ORDER BY 1

SELECT m.mt_cd "원자재코드", m.mt_nm "원자재명", m.mt_unit "단위", c.mt_qty "현재고", m.mt_sfqty "안전재고"
FROM mt m, mt_lot lot, mt_curqty c
WHERE m.mt_cd = lot.mt_cd AND lot.mt_lot = c.mt_lot AND m.mt_nm LIKE '%'||#{m1}||'%'
SELECT mt_nm "mt_nm", mt_cd "mt_cd" FROM mt
SELECT mt_nm "mt_nm", mt_cd "mt_cd" FROM mt WHERE mt_nm LIKE '%'||#{mtnm}||'%'
SELECT cd.cd_nm "cd_nm", vd.vdr_nm "vdr_nm", vd.vdr_cd "vdr_cd" FROM vendor vd, COMM_CODE cd WHERE vd.ven_cd = cd.comm_cd
SELECT cd.cd_nm "cd_nm", vd.vdr_nm "vdr_nm", vd.vdr_cd "vdr_cd" FROM vendor vd, COMM_CODE cd WHERE vd.ven_cd = cd.comm_cd AND vd.vdr_nm LIKE '%'||#{vdrnm}||'%'
SELECT po_cd "발주코드" FROM mt_po
SELECT po_cd "발주코드" FROM mt_po WHERE po_cd LIKE '%'||#{pocd}||'%'
